name: Index
htmlBanner:
Design Principles

Momentum visual system is modern, vibrant, accessible and relevant. The brand elements are flexible to bring our products together in a coherent and intuitive way, without ever overwhelming or distracting the user.

Personalized.html:
Customization

Inclusivity is at the heart of Webex. We support the individuality and uniqueness of our users through customizations - them-able interfaces and background image choices.

Our images always convey a sense of possibility and optimism. We choose images that evoke the characteristics of our brand language:

Seamless: Images with compositions and subject matter that feels flowing and dynamic.

Vibrant: Images that are uplifting and evocative‚Äîbeautiful, colorful, textural.

Focused: Not overly complicated and busy. Simple, clear, relatable.

Personalized: Choice! Variety, global subject matter

Profile ownership

Our users are in control of how they are represented with customizable profiles and status indicators.

Self-expression

Our proprietary reactions not only give our users a delightful mode of non-verbal/written expression, they present more ways for users to be heard, to contribute, to express their unique identities.

Seasonal sets of our reactions that are available for a short period of time celebrate seasonal festivities and holidays recognized around the world, acknowledging the new era of remote working from anywhere that our products facilitate.

Focused.html:
Typography

The key goal of our entire visual system is to present information as clearly as possible. We adopt native fonts per platform, as this offers familiarity and a natural visual integration with platform environments.

A simplified and harmonious type system creates a more modern, vibrant and elegant expression.

Typography
Guidelines

Iconography

Our icons are deliberately designed as a part of a broader graphic system of functional glyphs and more expressive, metaphoric illustrations.

Our icons are simple, clear, intuitive, and adopt the roundness and approachability of our broader visual system. They represent common actions across our products, offering familiarity for our users.

Iconography
Library
Iconography
Guidelines

Platform compatibility

Our products integrate harmoniously within the user‚Äôs environment to provide a streamlined experience. Our brand is flexible and adopts platform conventions where necessary, for example, on iOS we utilize SF symbols in place of branded icons to support the user‚Äôs mental model for actions.

Vibrant.html:
Colors

Our color palette is timeless, modern and vibrant, like our brand personality, with colors that integrate seamlessly, like the connections Webex enables. An expression of energy and synergy through vibrant colors and dynamic gradients.

Black

Supports strength, authority and gravitas. Black offers a neutral and immersive backdrop for text and imagery and brings our accent colors to life.

White

Brings a clean, modern sensibility to our look and enhances the presentation of our logo. White also serves as a clear canvas that allows our colors, text and imagery to stand out.

Primary green

Our green color is a revised version from the Webex legacy palette. It is reserved for a significant action, often a real time event. It is intentionally applied so it signals to users the key actions to take.

Primary blue

Our blue color is also a revised version of the Webex legacy scheme. It is used consistently across our products to draw attention to important information, such as notifications, alerts, and new content.

Decorative palette

Our decorative palette enriches our primary colors. Used sparingly and deliberately to add personality and character to our UI.

Color
Guidelines
Color
Token Library

Illustration

Illustration is useful for conveying complex ideas and abstract themes in a clear and universal manner.

Our illustration style achieves this by simplifying concepts to make them memorable, allowing our brand personality to grow in unexpected ways.

Illustration Guidelines
Illustration
Library

Seamless.html:
Seamless

The roundness of visual elements is derived from the Webex identity‚Äîthe Helix mark‚Äîevoking energy, motion, and humanity.

We carry these same traits through to our UI to engage users, both novice and expert, in experiences that feel familiar, fluid, and approachable.

The ‚Äúnotch‚Äù

Echoing our rounded UI system, we designed a corner device to add humanity to our products. It provides an overlay effect that suggests depth and layering.

Rounded elements

To soften the rigidness of our UI while offering a more approachable, fluid aesthetic. The corner radius is a common design element found across the entire Webex brand.

Fluid layout

In order to create seamless, fluid layouts we reduce the reliance on dividers, instead using spacing and typography to create visual hierarchy.

Layout Guidelines

Gradient

Gradients help convey the depth and seamlessness of our product experience. They flow (sometimes literally) and add a layered effect with a subtle focus on content.

We use gradients sparingly to help bring attention to important content and visuals, helping users focus on what matters.

Motion

The most powerful expression of our brand symbol is when it‚Äôs in motion.

Our motion system expresses the fluid and energetic movement of collaboration that defines the Webex experience.

Simple transitions between states give our UI a feeling of familiarity and seamlessness. We use motion to reduce visual friction and add little moments of delight to reward user action.

Overview.html:
Seamless

A design foundation based on roundness and interlace of curve, suggesting an expression of humanity and collaboration.

Vibrant

An expression of energy and synergy through uplifting colors, gradient pairing, motion, weight of illustration and typography.

Focused

A refined user experience with high-contrast visuals and intuitive layouts in both product and marketing, prioritizing what matters most.

Personalized

A brand system with built-in flexibility to allow individual expression through choice and customizable elements.

Above principles help define a uniquely Webex visual experience, but they‚Äôre not static. Meaning, they can flex (when needed) to bring forward the best of Webex, but it‚Äôs important to understand the underlying intention.

Webex Design

Manifesto

We‚Äôre a cross-disciplinary team of designers, writers, and researchers who care deeply about how people work together.

We work collaboratively, bridging distance gaps, cultures, and modes of working. We know, everyone says that. But we do it out of passion and necessity. We‚Äôre a global team whose innovation is reliant on the products we design. We‚Äôre living it every day.

We believe it‚Äôs not about where you work, but how you work. We welcome diversity of thought and diversity of background. We see personal expression as the most genuine form of communication. We actively nurture an environment where everyone has a voice‚Äîtheir voice.

We're committed to creating a design culture that‚Äôs honest, open, inclusive, supportive and amazingly creative. Where the stage is set for everyone to do the most meaningful work of their lives.

Design Values

Openness

We believe great ideas can come from anywhere. We inspire each other by actively sharing and welcoming new ideas and perspectives. Every voice counts.

Dilligence

We‚Äôre intentional, consistent, and driven by a strong sense of curiosity. We‚Äôre research-minded and deliberate with every design decision. We strive for great in everything we do.

Growth

We listen, learn, and improve every step of the way. We view honest, constructive feedback as an act of generosity. We‚Äôre brave and always open to new possibilities.

Craft

We‚Äôre artists, wordsmiths, researchers, and tinkerers. We bring our unique skills to the table to achieve the unachievable together. We do what we love, and love what we do.
